entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023
